attributes.action: address the Right Care, Right Deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petitioner is writing at the request of Age Concern, who is reported today as saying,

"Government is sleepwalking into a social care disaster. With more people needing care and support to live their lives, and a climate of funding concerns and tightening eligibility criteria, it is vital that the Government acts now. 

Please can all MP's sign the Right care Right deal Early Day Motion (EDM) to support a parliamentary debate to highlight the important issue of 
Just Equal Treatment in our fight against age discrimination.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
